Function Documentation

void addTime ( int &  time,
string &  s 
)

Adds time to the Player's In Game Playtime if addTime# tag is found in textfile can add multiple units of time if encountered more than once in a textfile. Afterwards the addTime# tags are removed from the game screen display string

Parameters:
time A reference to the integer time in game
s A reference to the frame buffer string that will be eventually displayed on the game screen

temporary string for use

indexes

find the index of (#)addTime#

no more checks to find - stop searching

find the index of (#)addTime#

add time

remove (addTime) from the display Players don't need to see the tag

Parameters:

options A reference to the options structure that contains all possible choices a player could have made in the area
